title: Mining Named Entities with Temporally Correlated Bursts from Multilingual Web News Streams

author: Alexander Kotov, Department of Computer Science, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign

So the main motivation behind our work is that web data is essentially generated by a large number of textual streams, such as GNU Streams, blogs, tweets, etc.
